newsitem.title: UK: Global Telesystems sets 60 mln Sfr convertible FRn.
newsitem.headline: Global Telesystems sets 60 mln Sfr convertible FRn.

text.p: Global Telesystems Ltd has issued a 60 million Swiss franc convertible FRN, lead manager Credit Suisse said.
The deal matures on November 4, 2003 with a put at par after November 4, 2001.
The deal pays six-month Libor plus 175 basis points.
The bond can be converted between April 1, 1997 and October 3, 2003. The conversion price is 89 rupees per share. The exchange rate is fixed at 28.492 rupees per Swiss franc.
The issue is a private placement and unlisted. There is a refix on November 19, 1999 and November 19, 2000 for a maximum 20 percent.
